title: Sal Marinho
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Macrobiotic, Western, Buffet, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This macrobiotic restaurant has a buffet with around 20 options. Sometimes it may have an option with fish, but never uses any other kind of meat or dairy products. One or two options may contain eggs. However, the vast majority of the options are vegan. Good atmosphere and friendly owners.
